channel.title: No Code on LC-Research
channel.description: Recent content in No Code on LC-Research

item.title: My First Glide App
item.description: Over the years, I have acquired a fair number of electronic devices. Many of these carry built in batteries and require frequent charging. Only a few of these devices are in regular use. Many sit in shelves, sometimes even months without any use. To much of my dismay, a few of these silently died in shelves due to completely drained batteries. After loosing a fair amount of beloved gadgets, I finally decided to have some control over the charging business.
